thread.title: An Online Bank With a Personal Touch
thread.title_full: An Online Bank With a Personal Touch - WSJ

author: James Sterngold
title: An Online Bank With a Personal Touch
text:
WILMINGTON, N.C.—As an online bank with no branches, Live Oak Bancshares Inc. looks more like a Silicon Valley startup than a financial institution. Its bankers can bring their dogs to work and wear flip flops to the office, which has a sign in the window saying it handles no cash.
But when the credit committee met recently to consider a loan to a Georgia chicken farmer, founder James S. “Chip” Mahan turned to his gut instead of an...
